g++   -O3 -msse2 -msse3 -Wall -std=c++11  -O3 -DNDEBUG  -static  CMakeFiles/super4pcs.dir/src/super4pcs/super4pcs_test.cc.o CMakeFiles/super4pcs.dir/super4pcs_automoc.cpp.o  -o super4pcs -rdynamic ../lib/libsuper4pcs_algo.a ../lib/libsuper4pcs_io.a /opt/opencv-2.4.13/lib/libopencv_highgui.so.2.4.13 /opt/opencv-2.4.13/lib/libopencv_core.so.2.4.13 /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libnppc.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libnppi.so /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libnpps.so -ldl -lm -lpthread -lrt -Wl,-rpath,/opt/opencv-2.4.13/lib:/usr/local/cuda/lib64 -Wl,-rpath-link,/opt/opencv-2.4.13/lib
